field.name: panelWidth
field.label: Width
field.description: The width of the panel where the boxes and login form are going to be showed.

field.name: panelHeight
field.label: Height
field.description: The height of the panel where the boxes and login form are going to be showed.

field.name: panelBg
field.label: Background color
field.description: The color of the panel's background.

field.name: panelOpacity
field.label: Background opacity
field.description: The opacity of the panel's background.

field.name: panelDir
field.label: Direction
field.description: The direction from wich the panel will come from.

field.name: panelSpeedIn
field.label: Slide In duration
field.description: The duration of the sliding effect.

field.name: panelTransTypeIn
field.label: Transition In type
field.description: The panel transition animation type.

field.name: panelTransEaseIn
field.label: Transition In Ease mode
field.description: The panel transition easing mode.

field.name: closeText
field.label: Close text
field.description: The text of the Close button.

field.name: panelCloseFx
field.label: Panel Closing FX
field.description: The FX to use when closing the panel.

field.name: panelSpeedOut
field.label: Slide Out duration
field.description: The duration of the sliding effect.

field.name: panelTransTypeOut
field.label: Transition Out type
field.description: The panel transition animation type.

field.name: panelTransEaseOut
field.label: Transition Out Ease mode
field.description: The panel transition easing mode.

field.name: boxesLayout
field.label: Boxes Layout
field.description: Select the layout of the panel.

field.name: boxesAnimOrder
field.label: Boxes Animation Order
field.description: Choose wich box to animate first or if animate both boxes simultaneously.

field.name: boxLeftWidth
field.label: Box Width
field.description: The width of the left box.

field.name: boxLeftHeight
field.label: Box Height
field.description: The height of the left box.

field.name: boxLeftFx
field.label: BoxLeft FX
field.description: The FX to use when animating the left box.

field.name: boxLeftDir
field.label: Slide Direction
field.description: The direction from wich the box will come from.

field.name: boxLeftSpeed
field.label: Transition duration
field.description: The duration of the Left Box effect.

field.name: boxLeftTransType
field.label: Transition type
field.description: The Left box transition animation type.

field.name: boxLeftTransEase
field.label: Transition Ease mode
field.description: The Left Box transition easing mode.

field.name: boxRightWidth
field.label: Right Box Width
field.description: The with of the right box.

field.name: boxRightHeight
field.label: Right Box Height
field.description: The height of the right box.

field.name: boxRightFx
field.label: BoxRight FX
field.description: The FX to use when animating the right box.

field.name: boxRightDir
field.label: Right Box Slide Direction
field.description: The direction from wich the box will come from.

field.name: boxRightSpeed
field.label: Transition duration
field.description: The duration of the Right Box effect.

field.name: boxRightTransType
field.label: Transition type
field.description: The Right Box transition animation type.

field.name: boxRightTransEase
field.label: Transition Ease mode
field.description: The Right Box transition easing mode.

field.name: template
field.description: Choose a pre-made template for module contents, or select 'none' and use the advanced fields to enter custom code in them.

field.name: plugins
field.label: Content plugins
field.description: Enable or disable content plugins.

field.name: trigger
field.label: Trigger
field.description: The content of the trigger. You can use plain text, HTML and CSS.

field.name: triggerout
field.label: Trigger Out
field.description: The content of the trigger out. You can use plain text, HTML and CSS.

field.name: boxLeft
field.label: Left Box
field.description: The content of the left box. You can use plain text, HTML, CSS and {loginform} markup.

field.name: boxRight
field.label: Right Box
field.description: The content of the right box. You can use plain text, HTML, CSS and {loginform} markup.
